title: Crime.Secrets.Crimson.Lily-PROPHET
description:
Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily  (c) Artifex Mundi

release date ...: October 2769
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/PL/RU/KR/JP/CN-S

Fantastic hidden object puzzle adventure game vfrom
the creators of Enigmatis and Grim  Legends!  Crime
Secrets: Crimson Lily is  a  captivating  blend  of
hidden  object  challenges,  puzzle  solving,   and
daring detective work.

When a grim murder interrupts a private detective's
vacation at the very gate to the hotel at which she
was going to stay, she puts her plans  for  R&R  on
hold and sets out to do what she does  best:  solve
violent crimes. All she has to go on  is  a  single
clue: a  mysterious  paper  lily  attached  to  the
victim's frozen body.  Could  it  be  the  killer's
calling card?

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!
